text: I also noticed my RGB value that I split into an array stopped working (when previously it worked fine), wonder if its related.

I am getting to following error in my theme and was wondering if  anyone has some idea what im doing wrong.
"Resolving path "../../css/main.css" from parent template, use relative path from module instead"
Which I dont really get...because that is a relative path, isnt it?
This is the bit of code in question
Edit: I cloned the folder, named it css2, updated the file path and the error still is the same...with the old file path.
```{{ require_css(get_asset_url('../../css/main.css')) }}```
not sure without seeing your entire work tree, but the path needs to be relative from the module, and HubSpot thinks it isnâ€™t. are your modules and templates at different depths of the tree?
might need one more ../, for example
I think I found it, the error reference was not actually for the bit of code I though it was, but instead referred to something in a module that was on the page.
